transcript.speaker: Clinician
transcript.text: Sophia, if you could step on the scale for me please. I'll check your height and weight.

transcript.speaker: Clinician
transcript.text: Height is 5 feet 5 inches, and your weight is 125 pounds. Right in line with last year, just a bit taller. Growth looks steady and healthy.

transcript.speaker: Parent
transcript.text: She's always been consistent. Never had major growth spurts.

result.information: Weight is 125 pounds, height is 5 feet 5 inches
